sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function ProgressBar({focusDuration, session, isTimerRunning }){ let progress = 0; const maxDuration = focusDuration*60; if(isTimerRunning){ progress = ((maxDuration - session.timeRemaining)/maxDuration)*100; console.log(progress) console.log(session) return (<>
{/* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for { minutesToDuration(focusDuration)} minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(session?.timeRemaining)} remaining

) } }
